title: Sarri 'planning Premier League triple transfer swoop' as he eyes Kante, Eriksen and Emerson
text:
Maurizio Sarri is planning to raid the Premier League for a sensational triple transfer at the end of the season, according to reports.

The Italian took over at Juventus in the summer and is reportedly eyeing up his former club Chelsea for two players, as well as Tottenham's Christian Eriksen.

Ilbianconero claim that Sarri is keeping tabs on both N'Golo Kante and Emerson Palmieri at Stamford Bridge, with a view to swooping for them both in the summer.

N'Golo Kante (left) is reportedly a transfer target for Maurizio Sarri at Juventus in the summer

Sarri is also said to be keen on Emerson Palmieri (left), who he worked with at Chelsea

Le10 Sport then follow that up with a report that Spurs star Eriksen has been lined up for a free transfer as he runs down his contract in north London.

Sarri has made a brilliant start to life at Juve, winning six and drawing one of his first seven Serie A matches.

One huge objective for him in Turin is to bring Champions League success, and the arrivals of Eriksen and Kante in particular would be a huge boost.

Christian Eriksen is running down his Spurs contract and can leave for free next summer
